basics.name: Vivek Kushwah
basics.label: Senior DevSecOps Engineer
basics.summary: Senior DevSecOps Engineer with 5+ years of hands-on AWS cloud operations experience specializing in CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code, Disaster Recovery, observability, and multi-tenant production systems. Proven track record in 24x7 production support, cloud cost optimization, automation-first operations, and platform reliability. Strong Linux background with deep expertise in AWS, Kubernetes, Terraform, CI/CD pipelines, and monitoring. Experienced working remotely with global teams on business-critical platforms.

work.name: ZebPay
work.summary: Owned end-to-end cloud operations for highly available, customer-facing, multi-tenant production platforms on AWS.
highlights: Designed and implemented CI/CD best practices using GitHub Actions with reusable workflows, SAST, container scanning, and rollback-safe deployments
Architected and implemented Disaster Recovery and backup strategies across RDS, EBS, EFS, ECR, and S3
Led migration from Azure APIM to AWS API Gateway improving security, latency, and operational simplicity
Reduced cloud spend by ~40% through rightsizing, autoscaling, tagging enforcement, and cost dashboards
Built centralized observability using Prometheus, Grafana, Thanos, and Loki with Opsgenie alerting
Participated in 24x7 on-call rotations with RCA and incident handling
Automated patching, compliance, DNS onboarding, and WAF enforcement using Terraform and AWS services

work.name: Rizzle

highlights: Designed resilient Kubernetes deployments with autoscaling, probes, and rollout strategies

Provided hands-on production support with monitoring via Prometheus and Grafana
